body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       The Nation's treasured public lands don't take care of themselves! It takes a team of professionals in fields as diverse as botany, storytelling, civil engineering and business administration (to name a few) to protect and preserve these places. In these pages, you can get a look at what's going on behind the scenes at Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area. title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Management
